an4.274:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
an4.274:1.4: vedanasu …pe… citte …pe… dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
an4.274:1.5: Ragassa, bhikkhave, abhinnaya ime cattaro dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
